name: daux-api-docs-theme
description: Daux theme modified to build libraries API docs

scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/lessc daux/less/theme-navy.less daux/css/theme-navy.min.css && node_modules/.bin/lessc daux/less/theme-green.less daux/css/theme-green.min.css && node_modules/.bin/lessc daux/less/theme-blue.less daux/css/theme-blue.min.css && node_modules/.bin/lessc daux/less/theme-red.less daux/css/theme-red.min.css

author: Vlad Balin
